actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-1049.

official_title: An original resolution relating to the purchase of calendars for 1975.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate $905, in addition to the amount specified in S.Res. 299, Ninety-third Congress, agreed to March 26, 1974, to pay for the increased cost of calendars authorized to be purchased under that resolution and to purchase two hundred and fifty additional calendars.

titles.title: An original resolution relating to the purchase of calendars for 1975.
